# Portfolio Project Instructions

This is a premium Next.js portfolio website with App Router, Tailwind CSS, and next-themes for light/dark mode switching.

## Project Structure
- Next.js 14 with App Router
- Tailwind CSS for styling  
- Framer Motion for animations
- next-themes for theme management
- Fully responsive design

## Development Guidelines
- Use TypeScript for type safety
- Follow component-based architecture
- Implement proper SEO with metadata
- Ensure accessibility standards
- Maintain clean, readable code

## Content Guidelines
- All content should be based on LinkedIn profile information
- Professional, modern, premium feel
- Consistent branding between light and dark modes
